name: reversegeocode

params.description: API key for services call (reverse geocode service), mandatory if autoconf service has not been charged in advance
params.name: options.apiKey

params.description: use of ssl or not (default true, service requested using https protocol)
params.name: options.ssl

params.description: position of component into the map, 'topleft' by default
params.name: options.position

params.description: Specify if widget has to be collapsed (true) or not (false) on map loading. Default is true.
params.name: options.collapsed

params.description: delimitations for reverse geocoding, by default : ["Point", "Circle", "Extent"]
params.name: options.delimitations

params.description: reverse geocode service options. see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~ReverseGeocode Gp.Services.reverseGeocode()} to know all reverse geocode options.
params.name: options.reverseGeocodeOptions
